title: UK University Old Style...
content:
Hello.

Any ideas? I know they use Goudy Old Style for some printed publications...

Thanks in advance.

author: Rez Oo

comments.content:
They’re mixing old with modern then.  
It’s [Goudy Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704195027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/goudy-modern-mt/familytree.html).
